Orb of Destruction.abilityDesc: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs individually.

Orb Volley.abilityDesc: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power.
Orb Volley.behavior: Zenyatta gathers power for a few seconds, increasing the amount of orbs he will fire simultaneously, up to a maximum of 5.

details: Multiple orbs stack additively. (Unconfirmed)
Orb of Harmony.abilityDesc: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time.
Orb of Harmony.behavior: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. The orb slowly restores health to his ally, so long as Zenyatta remains alive and the ally remains within Zenyatta's line-of-sight. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time. If Zenyatta loses sight of the player being healed, Orb of Harmony will be returned to Zenyatta within 3 seconds.

Orb of Discord.abilityDesc: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time.
Orb of Discord.behavior: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive, and it stays attached to the enemy player for as long as they are in Zenyatta's line of sight. It also gives Zenyatta brief vision of that player if he should lose sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time. If Zenyatta loses sight of the player afflicted, Orb of Discord will be returned to Zenyatta within 3 seconds.

Transcendence.abilityDesc: Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.
Transcendence.behavior: For the duration, Zenyatta is immune to damage and heals himself and allies in an area around him.

achievements.name: Rapid Discord
achievements.desc: Get 4 kills or assists with Zenyatta's Orb of Discord within 6 seconds in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: The Iris Embraces You
achievements.desc: Restore 1500 Health with a single use of Zenyatta's Transcendence in Quick or Competitive play.

Fusion Cannons.abilityDesc: D.Va's mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload, but slow D.Va’s movement while they’re active.

details: Recharging starts 1 second after ability is cancelled.
Defense Matrix.abilityDesc: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air.
Defense Matrix.behavior: D.Va cannot attack while the ability is active.

Boosters.abilityDesc: D.Va’s mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

details: The explosion does not deal damage to the casting D.Va.
If D.Va's mech is destroyed by an enemy, she will continue to passively gain charge for Self Destruct while she is out of her mech, but damage she inflicts will only gain her charge for Call Mech.
The detonating mech will preserve the momentum from Boosters.
Self-Destruct.abilityDesc: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents.

details: It is automatically reloaded when D.Va enters her mech.
Light Gun.abilityDesc: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster.

details: Call Mech can be used instantly after the mech detonates from Self Destruct.
Call Mech.abilityDesc: If her armored battle suit is destroyed, D.Va can call down a fresh mech and return to the fray.

achievements.name: Shot Down
achievements.desc: Prevent 1500 damage with a single use of D.Va's Defense Matrix in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Game Over
achievements.desc: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of D.Va's Self-Destruct in Quick or Competitive play.

Rocket Hammer.abilityDesc: Reinhardt’s Rocket Hammer is an exemplary melee weapon, able to deal punishing damage in a wide arc with every swing.
Rocket Hammer.behavior: Reinhardt's primary weapon. Pressing the primary fire button causes Reinhardt to swing the hammer, dealing damage to all enemies in a cone in front of Reinhardt.

details: During the game's late alpha (and possibly before) this ability was called Shield.[2]

stats.Healing: 225 shield per second, after being down for 2 seconds

Barrier Field.abilityDesc: Reinhardt projects a broad, forward-facing energy shield, which can absorb substantial damage before it is destroyed. Though Reinhardt can protect himself and his companions behind the shield, he cannot attack while sustaining it.
Barrier Field.behavior: The Barrier Field is a powerful, rectangular barrier that Reinhardt carries like a shield, blocking most projectiles and bullets that hit it. It can be activated by pressing and holding down the secondary fire button. The barrier has its own separate Health pool, and Barrier Field is disabled if the barrier's Health drops to 0. Reinhardt will regenerate lost barrier Health after a few seconds of not activating Barrier Field.

details: Stuns, such as those from Roadhog or McCree, will immediately end Charge.
Crushing a pinned target against a wall will deal massive damage, enough to kill almost any non-Tank instantly.
If two Charging Reinhardts collide, both Reinhardts will be stunned and their Charges will be cancelled.
Charge.abilityDesc: Reinhardt charges forth in a straight line, grabbing hold of enemies in his path. If he collides with a wall, foes he’s carrying suffer extreme damage.
Charge.behavior: When activated, Reinhardt propels himself forwards at significant speed but with reduced ability to turn. Charge ends after a period of time or when Reinhardt collides with a solid surface. The first enemy Reinhardt collides with during his charge is "pinned" to Reinhardt, and is dealt heavy damage if Reinhardt then impacts a solid surface. All other enemies are knocked away from him.

Fire Strike.abilityDesc: By whipping his Rocket Hammer forward, Reinhardt slings a flaming projectile which pierces and damages any enemies it touches.
Fire Strike.behavior: When activated, Reinhardt will hurl a flaming projectile forwards that deals decent damage to any enemy it hits. This projectile passes through enemies and barriers, meaning that a single projectile can hit multiple opponents. It stops upon impacting a solid surface.

details: This ability can be blocked by an enemy Reinhardt Barrier Field.
Earthshatter has a small amount of vertical height. Jumping enemies can still be hit by it.
If Reinhardt is knocked into the air when activating Earthshatter, he will not use it until after he lands.
Earth Shatter.abilityDesc: Reinhardt forcefully slams his rocket hammer into the ground, knocking down and damaging all enemies in front of him.
Earth Shatter.behavior: When activated, Reinhardt slams his hammer into the ground, creating a cone of force that damages and stuns enemies who are hit by it. This ability respects line of sight, so anyone Reinhardt can't see is not affected by it.

achievements.name: I Am Your Shield
achievements.desc: Block 8000 damage with Reinhardt's Barrier Field without dying in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Storm, Earth and Fire
achievements.desc: Land Reinhardt's Fire Strike and Charge after an Earthshatter stun in Quick or Competitive play.

stats.Number of pellets: 1 projectile per shot25 pellets per shot

Scrap Gun.abilityDesc: Alternatively, it can launch a shrapnel ball that detonates farther away, scattering metal fragments from the point of impact.
Scrap Gun.behavior: Scrap Gun's secondary fire fires a projectile which, after travelling a short distance, explodes and shoots out a cone of pellets, very similar to his primary fire, dealing heavy damage. If the first projectile hits a target before detonating, it will deal 50 damage.

details: The entire animation of Take A Breather lasts 2 seconds, during which Roadhog is immobilized; the part where healing takes place only lasts 1 second.

Take A Breather can be used to animation cancel Roadhog's reload animation. The ammo counter is restored very shortly after Roadhog stuffs a fistful of scrap into the gun. Using Take A Breather as soon as the ammo counter reads '4' can shave around half a second of the usual reload/heal ritual that follows most engagements as Roadhog.
Take a Breather.abilityDesc: Roadhog restores a chunk of his health over a brief period of time.
Take a Breather.behavior: When activated, Roadhog will inhale from a special canister, restoring 300 Health. This is a channeled ability; Roadhog can take no other actions when it's being used, and stuns can interrupt the healing effect.

details: Chain Hook cannot pull friendly targets.

Chain Hook can be used to interrupt channeled abilities, including Ultimate abilities. For example, hooking a Pharah while she is using Barrage will cancel her Ultimate, wasting the effect; while hooking a Reinhardt in the middle of using Charge will cancel his charge, and will not allow him to inflict his Pinned effect.

The damage of Chain Hook is inflicted the instant it lands. If this damage is enough to kill the target, the hook will return instantly to Roadhog without holding him in place as it usually does on a hit.
Chain Hook.abilityDesc: Roadhog hurls his chain at a target; if it catches, he yanks them into close range.
Chain Hook.behavior: When activated, Roadhog fires a hook at his crosshairs that travels out to a long range before returning back to him. If the hook strikes an enemy, it will pull that enemy back to Roadhog, as well as stunning them for a brief period of time. Solid surfaces and barriers stop the hook entirely.

details: Whole Hog does more than increase the Scrap Gun's fire rate. It also changes the spread pattern from a wide circle to an extremely wide horizontal spread (approximately 30 degrees) with little vertical spread. This makes it important to control the vertical recoil and aim of the ability, and means that it can be countered by attacking Roadhog from different elevation levels whilst the ultimate is in use.

While the ultimate is in use, Roadhog's bullets will have red tracer lines on enemy vision, making them an obvious threat. It also provides no extra durability to Roadhog, and removes his ability to heal, meaning focused fire can still bring him down if he's not disrupting all threats with the knockback.

Roadhog cannot control his firerate during the ultimate, the scrapgun simply fires even without a button being pressed. Scrap Gun ammo is ignored by this ultimate - it can be activated with an empty Scrap Gun, and the ammo count will be the same when the ultimate ends.
Whole Hog.abilityDesc: After cramming a top-loader onto his Scrap Gun, Roadhog pours in ammo. For a short time, he can crank out a stream of shrapnel that knocks back enemies.
Whole Hog.behavior: When activated, Roadhog begins to fire a broad cone of pellets in front of himself for a few seconds, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them back. Roadhog can still move while using Whole Hog, but he cannot use his normal weapons or abilities. This Ultimate is channeled, and can be interrupted by stuns.

achievements.name: Giving You The Hook
achievements.desc: Interrupt an enemy Ultimate Ability with Roadhog's Hook in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Hog Wild
achievements.desc: Knock 2 enemies to their deaths with one use of Roadhog's Whole Hog in Quick or Competitive play.

Tesla Cannon.abilityDesc: Winston’s weapon fires a short-range electric barrage for as long as he holds down the trigger.

Jump Pack.abilityDesc: Assisted by his energy pack, Winston lunges through the air, dealing significant damage and staggering nearby enemies when he lands.

Barrier Projector.abilityDesc: Winston’s barrier projector extends a bubble-shaped field that absorbs damage until it's destroyed. Allies protected by the barrier can return fire from within it.

details: Also lowers the cooldown on Jump Pack to 2 seconds.
Primal Rage.abilityDesc: Winston embraces his animal nature, significantly boosting his health and making him very difficult to kill, strengthening his melee attack, and allowing him to use his Jump Pack ability more frequently. While raging, Winston can only make melee and Jump Pack attacks.

achievements.name: Mine Sweeper
achievements.desc: Destroy 10 turrets or traps using Winston's Tesla Cannon without dying in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Anger Management
achievements.desc: Damage 6 enemies during a single use of Winston's Primal Rage in Quick or Competitive play.

details: Energy increases the damage of both of Particle Cannons firing modes, but do not increase the damage of Graviton Surge.

stats.Reload time: +1 point of energy per 4 points of damage absorbed

Energy.abilityDesc: Damage blocked increases Particle Cannon damage.
Energy.behavior: Zarya spawns with 0 Energy and can gain a maximum of 100 Energy. Blocking damage with Particle Barrier or Projected Barrier charges energy. Every point of energy increases the damage of Particle Cannon.

details: Energy level increases explosion radius.
Particle Cannon.abilityDesc: Alternatively, Zarya can lob an explosive charge to strike multiple opponents.
Particle Cannon.behavior: Zarya lobs a ball of energy from her Particle Cannon which explodes on impact.

details: Particle Barrier behaves differently compared to normal barriers, acting more like additional Health than Reinhardt's Barrier Field. Attacks that normally pass through a barrier and deal damage, such as Winston's Tesla Cannon, will still have their damage and effects absorbed by Particle Barrier.
As long as Particle Barrier has at least 1 Health worth of absorption left, it will prevent all incoming negative effects.
Particle Barrier.abilityDesc: The Particle Cannon can emit a personal barrier that shields Zarya against incoming attacks, redirecting their energy to enhance her weapon’s damage and the width of its beam.
Particle Barrier.behavior: When activated, Zarya will completely surround herself with a barrier for a brief period of time, absorbing a large amount of damage and making her immune to all negative effects (such as knockback or stun) while the barrier holds. Damage dealt to the Particle Barrier contributes to her Energy.

details: Projected Barrier behaves identical to Particle Barrier. For more ability details, see Particle Barrier.
Projected Barrier.abilityDesc: Zarya surrounds one of her teammates with an energy barrier that simultaneously absorbs fire and boosts the power of her Particle Cannon.
Projected Barrier.behavior: When activated, Zarya will completely surround a targeted ally with a barrier for a brief period of time, absorbing a large amount of damage and making them immune to all negative effects (such as knockback or stun) while the barrier holds. Damage dealt to the Projected Barrier contributes to Zarya's Energy.

details: Certain movement abilities, such as Tracer's Blink, allow heroes to escape from the pull of Graviton Surge.

The projectile from Graviton Surge is destroyed if it hits an enemy Zarya's barrier or D.Va's Defense matrix, but if it hits Winston's or Reinhardt's barrier it will simply activate where struck. It may still not be a good idea to fire it at those places, as they will lessen or negate your team's ability to combo with it.
The projectile can be deflected by an enemy Genji, making it hostile towards your own team, as if cast by an enemy Zarya.
Graviton Surge.abilityDesc: Zarya launches a gravity bomb that draws in enemy combatants and deals damage while they’re trapped.
Graviton Surge.behavior: When activated, Zarya fires an energy projectile in an arc. When the projectile impacts a solid surface, it creates a temporary gravity well that continually pulls in all nearby enemies and deals damage over time to them.

achievements.name: Power Overwhelming
achievements.desc: Keep Zarya's Particle Cannon above 70 power for 60 seconds in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: The Power Of Attraction
achievements.desc: Capture 5 enemies in a single use of Zarya's Graviton Surge in Quick or Competitive play.

details: Biotic rifle can damage enemy Torbjörn turrets but can't heal friendly ones.

stats.Duration: 0.9 second damage/healing effect  0.25 seconds scoping in  0.16 seconds scoping out

Biotic Rifle.abilityDesc: Ana’s rifle shoots darts that can restore health to her allies or deal ongoing damage to her enemies. She can use the rifle’s scope to zoom in on targets and make highly accurate shots.
Biotic Rifle.behavior: The Biotic Rifle shoots darts that will heal allied heroes or damage enemy units, depending on what it hits. The dart is a fast moving projectile if fired from the hip, and a hitscan shot if firing while scoped.

details: Sleep dart does not affect Torbjörn turrets.
Sleep Dart.abilityDesc: Ana fires a dart from her sidearm, rendering an enemy unconscious (though any damage will rouse them).
Sleep Dart.behavior: After a short delay, Ana fires a fast moving dart from her sidearm. An enemy hit is stunned for a few seconds, but the effect is  broken in 0.5 seconds after the target takes damage.

details: Boosted allies receive 100% additional healing, whereas enemies take 100% reduced healing.
Healing from other sources includes healing from health packs.
Biotic Grenade.abilityDesc: Ana tosses a biotic bomb that deals damage to enemies and heals allies in a small area of effect. Affected allies briefly receive increased healing from all sources, while enemies caught in the blast cannot be healed for a few moments.
Biotic Grenade.behavior: On activation, Ana throws an arcing projectile that explodes on impact. Any ally caught within the splash radius are healed and any enemy takes damage. Allies also receive increased healing from all sources for a few seconds, while healing effects on enemies does nothing, for the same duration.

Nano Boost.abilityDesc: After Ana hits one of her allies with a combat boost, they temporarily move faster, deal more damage, and take less damage from enemies’ attacks.
Nano Boost.behavior: Aiming close to an ally will target them. On activation, the target will move faster, deal more damage and take less damage for a short amount of time.

achievements.name: Naptime
achievements.desc: Interrupt an enemy Ultimate Ability with Ana's Sleep Dart in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Enabler
achievements.desc: Get 4 kills or assists with a single use of Ana's Nano Boost in Quick or Competitive play.

details: To start a Wall Ride, press against a wall at a slight angle while in midair (such as while jumping or falling) and holding the jump button.

After you've initiated the Wall Ride, as long as you're pressing the jump button, you'll remain Wall Riding. The only things that will affect your trajectory are Crossfading and releasing the jump button.

After releasing from a wall, you cannot immediately Wall Ride any wall facing the same direction, including the original. You must land or Wall Ride on a wall facing a different direction to reset this. Curved surfaces count as facing a different direction.
Wall Ride.abilityDesc: Jump onto a wall to ride along it.
Wall Ride.behavior: By using this ability effectively, Lúcio can reach otherwise inaccessible places, take shortcuts, and make himself more difficult to hit.

Sonic Amplifier.abilityDesc: Lúcio can hit his enemies with sonic projectiles.

Soundwave.abilityDesc: Lúcio can knock his enemies back with a blast of sound.
Soundwave.behavior: Lúcio fires a short-range AOE blast that pushes enemies away.

Crossfade.abilityDesc: Lúcio continuously energizes himself — and nearby teammates — with music. He can switch between two songs: one amplifies movement speed, while the other regenerates health.
Crossfade.behavior: Lúcio passively buffs himself and all allies that he has line of sight to within 30 meters. Activating Crossfade switches between a speed boost and a healing aura.

Amp It Up.abilityDesc: Lúcio increases the volume on his speakers, boosting the effects of his songs.
Amp It Up.behavior: Lúcio drastically increases his aura's effectiveness for a short time.

Sound Barrier.abilityDesc: Protective waves radiate out from Lúcio’s Sonic Amplifier, briefly providing him and nearby allies with personal shields.
Sound Barrier.behavior: Lúcio gives himself and all allies he has line of sight to within 30 meters a large amount of temporary health, which rapidly decays.

achievements.name: The Floor Is Lava
achievements.desc: Get 3 killing blows while Wall Riding as Lúcio without dying in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Supersonic
achievements.desc: Block 1000 damage with a single use of Lúcio's Sound Barrier in Quick or Competitive play.

stats.Healing: 20 health per second after not taking damage for 3 seconds

Angelic Descent.abilityDesc: Propelled by her Valkyrie suit, Mercy slows the speed of her descent from great heights.
Angelic Descent.behavior: While airborne, Mercy can press and hold the jump button to begin slowly falling to the ground. Letting go of the jump button will end Angelic Descent.  Mercy will also passively regenerate health after a few seconds of not taking damage.

details: Tethering to an ally do not require you to continue to look at the tethered ally to maintain the tether.
The tether will break if they move out of range or line of sight.
Just after tethering to an ally there is a brief moment where the tether cannot be broken by either distance or by breaking line of sight.

stats.Ult charge gain: 4 points per 5 healing2 points per 3 damage done by the target

Caduceus Staff.abilityDesc: Mercy engages one of two beams that connect to an ally. By maintaining the beams, she can either restore that ally’s health or increase the amount of damage they deal.
Caduceus Staff.behavior: Primary fire creates a healing tether on the ally closest to Mercy's crosshairs, which remains for as long as Mercy holds down the primary fire button.Secondary fire creates a damage tether that works similarly to the healing tether but boosts damage instead of healing.

details: It is automatically reloaded if not equipped for approximately 1.4 seconds.
Caduceus Blaster.abilityDesc: Mercy shoots a round from her sidearm. It's best reserved for emergency personal defense.
Caduceus Blaster.behavior: Mercy shoots a fast moving projectile.

details: Guardian Angel can be cancelled mid-flight by pressing the hotkey once more.
Guardian Angel.abilityDesc: Mercy flies towards a targeted ally, allowing her to reach them quickly and provide assistance in crucial moments.
Guardian Angel.behavior: The ability can be used on both living and fallen allies, and can be cancelled mid-flight.

details: Also refreshes the cooldown on Guardian Angel.
Fallen allies are highlighted on the player's screen and the number of available targets are shown on their tooltip.
Resurrected players are able to move in 2.25 seconds after the ability is activated.

stats.Healing: Restores full health to fallen allies

Resurrect.abilityDesc: Mercy radiates restorative power, bringing nearby dead allies back into the fight with full health.
Resurrect.behavior: Mercy revives nearby dead allies at full health and with a brief moment of invulnerability. Resurrect has a short cast time during which Mercy can still move.

achievements.name: Group Health Plan
achievements.desc: Restore 200 health for 5 players without dying as Mercy in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Huge Rez
achievements.desc: Resurrect 4 players at once with Mercy in Quick or Competitive play.

details: When not casting, levels decay one per second, at the same rate as they are generated while casting.
Photon Projector.abilityDesc: Symmetra’s weapon emits a short-range beam that homes in on a nearby enemy, dealing continuous damage that increases the longer it is connected.
Photon Projector.behavior: Damage jumps to consecutive levels after one second of continuous casting. Damage levels fall off after 3 seconds without dealing damage.

stats.Ammo usage: 10 rounds per second castingup to 20 rounds per shot

Energy Ball.abilityDesc: The projector can also release a charged energy ball that deals high damage.
Energy Ball.behavior: The damage and size of the projectile depends on the amount of time and ammo spent on casting.

Sentry Turret.abilityDesc: Symmetra sets up a small turret that automatically fires speed-reducing blasts at the nearest enemy within range. Several turrets can be built on the battlefield at once.
Sentry Turret.behavior: Turrets can be placed on any non-destructive surface. Slowdown effect stacks with multiple turrets.

details: The shields will deactivate if Symmetra is switched to another hero.
Photon Shield.abilityDesc: Symmetra surrounds an ally with a hard-light shield that absorbs damage and persists as long as that ally remains alive.
Photon Shield.behavior: The shield regenerates at the rate of 25 per second after three seconds without any damage taken. The number of active shields is not limited.

details: Symmetra does not gain Ultimate charge while the Teleporter is active.

stats.Duration: Until destroyed or out of uses

Teleporter.abilityDesc: Symmetra places a teleporter exit pad at her current location, and connects it to a teleporter entry pad at her team’s starting point. Allies can travel through the entry pad to the exit pad instantly, enabling them to return to the fight swiftly after being defeated.
Teleporter.behavior: Placing the Teleporter will automatically place the entrance in a fixed location in spawn room.

achievements.name: The Car Wash
achievements.desc: Hit an enemy with 6[5] beams simultaneously as Symmetra in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: Huge Success
achievements.desc: Teleport 20 players in a single Quick or Competitive play game as Symmetra.

Orb of Destruction.abilityDesc: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs individually.

Orb Volley.abilityDesc: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power.
Orb Volley.behavior: Zenyatta gathers power for a few seconds, increasing the amount of orbs he will fire simultaneously, up to a maximum of 5.

details: Multiple orbs stack additively. (Unconfirmed)
Orb of Harmony.abilityDesc: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time.
Orb of Harmony.behavior: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. The orb slowly restores health to his ally, so long as Zenyatta remains alive and the ally remains within Zenyatta's line-of-sight. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time. If Zenyatta loses sight of the player being healed, Orb of Harmony will be returned to Zenyatta within 3 seconds.

Orb of Discord.abilityDesc: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time.
Orb of Discord.behavior: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive, and it stays attached to the enemy player for as long as they are in Zenyatta's line of sight. It also gives Zenyatta brief vision of that player if he should lose sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time. If Zenyatta loses sight of the player afflicted, Orb of Discord will be returned to Zenyatta within 3 seconds.

Transcendence.abilityDesc: Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.
Transcendence.behavior: For the duration, Zenyatta is immune to damage and heals himself and allies in an area around him.

achievements.name: Rapid Discord
achievements.desc: Get 4 kills or assists with Zenyatta's Orb of Discord within 6 seconds in Quick or Competitive play.

achievements.name: The Iris Embraces You
achievements.desc: Restore 1500 Health with a single use of Zenyatta's Transcendence in Quick or Competitive play.
